thread.title: Unprecedented frenzy around Broadway debut in India
thread.title_full: Unprecedented frenzy around Broadway debut in India - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Unprecedented frenzy around Broadway debut in India
text: The frenzy around the debut of Broadway in India with the timeless classic "Beauty and the Beast", has escalated with an unprecedented sale of tickets. Delighted by the enthusiasm, the show's director Vikranth Pawar says the team is putting their energy to bring alive a "never-seen-before spectacle". Â»
